abstract: International Olympic Committee Vice Pres John Coates expresses greater confidence in Rio de Janeiro’s preparations for 2016 Olympics; other Olympics news noted.
lead_paragraph: John Coates, the International Olympic Committee vice president who almost a year ago called Rio de Janeiro’s preparations for the 2016 Olympics the worst in memory, now says much has changed.

headline.main: I.O.C. Official Feeling Better About Rio

snippet: John Coates, the International Olympic Committee vice president who almost a year ago called Rio de Janeiro’s preparations for the 2016 Olympics the worst in memory, now says much has changed.
